channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLscienceAndDiscovery
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLscienceAndDiscovery, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tylenol in pregnancy linked to higher autism risk, Harvard scientists report
item.description: Researchers reviewing 46 studies found evidence linking prenatal acetaminophen (Tylenol) exposure with higher risks of autism and ADHD. The FDA has si...

item.title: Stressed koalas are facing a deadly epidemic
item.description: Researchers have shown that stress and retrovirus levels are tightly linked to disease in koalas. High KoRV loads make koalas more vulnerable to chlam...

item.title: Dogs can tell how toys work without any training
item.description: Gifted dogs can categorize toys by function, not just appearance. In playful at-home tests, they linked labels like “fetch” and “pull” to toys—even on...

item.title: Diamonds reveal hidden chemistry deep inside Earth
item.description: South African diamonds have revealed nickel-rich metallic inclusions, offering the first direct evidence of reactions predicted to occur deep in Earth...

item.title: NASA’s Mars rover Curiosity captures stunning details of alien rock formations
item.description: Curiosity is exploring Mars’ boxwork terrain, where ridges and hollows may have formed from cementation and erosion. The rover has been documenting ro...
